bio: A store mannequin and very gifted mimic. Anyone he Inspirits starts doing impressions of others whenever possible.

soultimate.name: Imitate Guardian
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Increases own Defense by 350% for 30 seconds
soultimate.description: Defense greatly increased, and foes focus on you.

skill.effect: Copy the skill of one ally.
skill.name: Me Too!

name: Mimikin
